utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And that's why, no matter what mommy says, we really were on a break. Yes we were! Yes we were! Come here gorgeous. Oh! Look at you! You are the cutest little baby ever! You're just a... a little bitty baby, you know that? But you've got... You've got big beautiful eyes... Yes you do... and a... and a big round belly. Big baby butt! I like big butts. I like big butts and I cannot lie / you other brothers can't deny / when a girl walks in with an itty, bitty, waist / and a round thing in your face you get... Oh my God, Emma... you're laughing! Oh my God, you've never done that before, have you? You never done that before... Daddy made you laugh, huh? Well, daddy and Sir Mix Alot... What? What? You... you wanna hear some more? Uhm... My anaconda don't want none / unless you got buns hon... I'm a terrible father!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey... hey listen... What do you guys know about investments?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How come?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I'm starting to make good money on the show and I'm thinking... I should probably do something with it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What do you do with your money now?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I just tape it to the back of my toilet tank. I didn't say that! It's in a bank guarded by robots!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do you have any ideas?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, yeah... This guy at work got me excited about going in on an emu farm. That'd be kinda cool huh? Pitching in on the weekends, helping to plant the emus...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joe... Emus are birds. You raise them for meat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, I think you should consider something a little less risky. I mean, I think in this market, real estate is your best investment. The Fed just lowered the rates and the interest on your mortgage is totally deductible. That's right, I know some stuff!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, well... Maybe I'll join them some time. I just hope the club doesn't slip out of my hand and beat the moustache off his face.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, totally! You are in such good hands. And I'm so good with meeting parents. With the father, you know, you want to flirt a little bit, but not in a gross way. Just kind of like: "Oh Mr. Pincer, I can see where Wallis gets his good looks..."

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, with the mother, just... just constantly tell her how amazing her son is. Take it from me, moms love me. Ross's mom one time actually said I'm like the daughter that she never had.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.content: I just finished getting Phoebe all dressed to meet Mike's parents. She's so nervous, it's so sweet!

utterance.speaker: Ross

utterance.content: Yeah, and it was uhm... it was like a real little person laugh too. It was... it was like uhm... Only... only not creepy.

utterance.content: You WHAT? You sang... to our baby daughter... a song about a guy who likes to have sex with women with giant asses?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But you know what, if you think about it, it actually promotes a healthy uhm... body image... because... even big butts or uhm... juicy doubles.

utterance.speaker: Ross

utterance.speaker: Joey

utterance.content: All the appliances are included. There is a lot of light, a new kitchen... I think you guys would be very happy here...

utterance.content: No, no, no, no, no, NO! No, no... we're not together. We're not a couple. We're definitely not a couple.

utterance.content: We're not gonna have this conversation again... Look at this place. Why am I so intimidated by this guy? Pretentious art, this huge macho couch. When we know all he does is sit around all day crying about losing Monica to a real man! You don't think he's here, do you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You know what it is? It's a nice place but I gotta see, I don't know if I see myself living here. Oh, oh, oh, let me see... Yeah, I could see it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe

utterance.content: But, I mean, you have met... humans before, right? Look, why don't you go talk to my mom?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah okay... yeah, your mom... okay... She looks nice, I can talk to her.

utterance.content: Yeah, you do that, and I go check my dad for signs of internal bleeding.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah... Oh Bitsy, hi. Uhm... listen I just wanted to thank you again for having me here tonight.

utterance.speaker: Bitsy
utterance.content: Well, not at all...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Also uhm... I just want you to know what a wonderful man your son is.

utterance.content: Thank you, I think so too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, and you know, it really is a testament to how he was raised. Especially to you. Because he's very respectful of women.

utterance.content: Is he really?

utterance.content: Are you kidding. He is so considerate of my feelings and... you know I think... you'd also like to know that he is a very gentle lover.

utterance.speaker: Bitsy
utterance.content: That's... my boy.

utterance.content: Awesome!

utterance.content: I'm not gonna watch it... I don't NEED to watch it... I mean, what good could possibly come from watching? Well, we know I'm gonna watch it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Guess I don't know. My experience: if a girl says yes to being taped... She doesn't say no to much else, I tell ya...
